p: CECR-AgNPs (Crude extract of Crassocephalum rubens-silver nanoparticles); CECR-AuNPs (Crude extract of Crassocephalum rubens-gold nanoparticles); AECR-AgNPs (Aqueous extract of Crassocephalum rubens-silver nanoparticles); AECR-AuNPs (Aqueous extract of Crassocephalum rubens-gold nanoparticles); CECR (Crude extract of Crassocephalum rubens).
